lead_paragraph: YASSKY--Herbert L.,95, philanthropic heart, lived and died the way he chose. Beloved father of Brahna Yassky and grandfather of James Janovsky. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  YASSKY, HERBERT L.
